text: Bactriola minuscula is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Fontes and Martins in 1977. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Bactriola minuscula. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1977
title: Bactriola minuscula
